disease: Other specified malignant neoplasm of skin of unspecified upper limb, including shoulder

symptoms.name: General malaise or weakness
symptoms.pattern: May be present, especially with rapidly progressing cancers

physical_findings: Abnormal skin lesion on upper limb or shoulder

required: Histopathological confirmation of malignant neoplasm of skin
supportive: Clinical presentation consistent with skin cancer (e.g., lesion on upper limb or shoulder)
